languages.text: {n}Эффект внезапности позволил быстро расправиться с верхушкой культа, после чего оставшиеся еретики растерялись и утратили решимость. Нечестивые капища запылали.{/n}
{n}The element of surprise facilitated the swift extermination of the cult leaders, leading the rest of the heretics to lose heart. The filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Эффект внезапности позволил быстро расправиться с верхушкой культа, после чего оставшиеся еретики растерялись и утратили решимость. Нечестивые капища запылали.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The element of surprise allowed to swiftly exterminate the leaders of the cult, and the rest of the heretics have lost their heart. The filthy shrines of the heretics were set alight.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在出其不意的打击之下，邪教领袖迅速被消灭。其余的异端分子纷纷失去了战意，他们邪恶的神殿也被付之一炬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The element of surprise facilitated the swift extermination of the cult leaders, leading the rest of the heretics to lose heart. The filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在出其不意的打击之下，邪教领袖迅速被消灭。其余的异端分子纷纷失去了战意，他们邪恶的神殿也被付之一炬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El factor sorpresa facilitó el rápido exterminio de los líderes del culto, desanimando al resto de los herejes. Los sucios santuarios de los herejes fueron incendiados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The element of surprise facilitated the swift extermination of the cult leaders, leading the rest of the heretics to lose heart. The filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El factor sorpresa facilitó el rápido exterminio de los líderes del culto, desanimando al resto de los herejes. Los sucios santuarios de los herejes fueron incendiados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奇襲により、魔女団のリーダーたちの迅速な根絶が促され、残りの異端者を戦意喪失させた。異端者たちの不浄な聖堂に火が放たれた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The element of surprise facilitated the swift extermination of the cult leaders, leading the rest of the heretics to lose heart. The filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奇襲により、魔女団のリーダーたちの迅速な根絶が促され、残りの異端者を戦意喪失させた。異端者たちの不浄な聖堂に火が放たれた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'effet de surprise est fatal aux chefs du culte, et leur mort rapide décourage les autres hérétiques. Les sanctuaires impies sont livrés aux flammes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The element of surprise facilitated the swift extermination of the cult leaders, leading the rest of the heretics to lose heart. The filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'effet de surprise est fatal aux chefs du culte, et leur mort rapide décourage les autres hérétiques. Les sanctuaires impies sont livrés aux flammes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Überraschungselement ermöglichte die schnelle Eliminierung der Anführer des Kults. Die übrigen Ketzer verloren dadurch den Mut. Die widerlichen Schreine der Ketzer wurden in Brand gesetzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The element of surprise facilitated the swift extermination of the cult leaders, leading the rest of the heretics to lose heart. The filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sürpriz faktörü, tarikat liderlerinin hızlıca ortadan kaldırılmasına olanak tanıyarak geri kalan kâfirlerin cesaretlerini yitirmelerine yol açtı. Kâfirlerin pislik içindeki mabetleri ateşe verildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The element of surprise facilitated the swift extermination of the cult leaders, leading the rest of the heretics to lose heart. The filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}
